description: ShareX dedicates to become the largest blockchain technology-based equity asset management and trading platform in China and even in the world. Based on blockchain’s features of decentralization and immutability, ShareX provides the companies with safe and convenient asset management system on one hand, solving the problems of such as the equity management, registration, grants, and right exercise in the form of the intelligent contract; and provides the equity holders with the zero-threshold, highly-efficient, safe, and secure equity circulation and trading platform, helping the equity holders quickly realize their equity and enabling the investors to invest into the star start-ups around the world with the lowest fund threshold.
name: ShareX
